author: daxian-dbw
body:
Tab characters are used when generating the string title in the method [`BuildXmlFromComments()`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/src/System.Management.Automation/help/HelpCommentsParser.cs#L356).
Per the discussion at [this comment](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/5737/files/a813fa9c770f6344e9cc4578ae9b1df7fddc7911#r173810132), tabs, in general, are problematic and thus the use here should be reviewed.
title: Review the use of tab characters '\t' in 'BuildXmlFromComments()' in HelpCommentsParser.cs
